description: A rare and mysterious ability that allows the user to hear the 'voice' of all things, including inanimate objects, animals, and ancient texts like Poneglyphs. This power enables communication and understanding beyond normal sensory perception.

reveals.revelation: Gol D. Roger possessed this ability, which allowed him to understand the Poneglyphs without being able to read them like scholars could.

mechanics: The ability allows the user to perceive the 'voice' or essence of all things. Unlike reading the ancient language of Poneglyphs, this power provides intuitive understanding through a form of spiritual or empathic connection.
limitations: The exact limitations are unknown, but it appears to be an innate ability that cannot be learned through training.
strategicApplications: Communication with Sea Kings and other creatures
Perceiving hidden truths about objects and history
culturalSignificance: This ability connects Roger to the ancient history of the world and may be linked to the Will of D and the prophecy of Joy Boy.
